name: THE KING OF FIGHTERS COLLECTION
description:
The most extensive collection of THE KING OF FIGHTERS.

THE KING OF FIGHTERS COLLECTION contains five complete games, not only does the collection
feature the entire Orochi Saga ( KOF '95, KOF '96, KOF '97), but it also features THE KING OF FIGHTERS '94 and fan favorite, THE KING OF FIGHTERS '98.

Also included are a variety of unlockable bonus features.


'THE KING OF FIGHTERS' is a registered trademark of SNK PLAYMORE CORPORATION.
